frontmatter.title: LocalStorage and Event Delegation
frontmatter.desc: This is the 15th project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We'll be building a to-do list of sorts, with local storage to persist the information across a refresh or reload.

frontmatter.title: Webcam fun
frontmatter.desc: This is the 19th project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. Today we'll use getUserMedia and Canvas to capture a video stream from a user's webcam and manipulate the pixels.

frontmatter.title: JS Checkbox
frontmatter.desc: This is the tenth project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We'll be building a gmail style "hold shift and check all" items type list. You can check any element in the list, then hold shift and check another element, and all the elements in between should also get checked.

frontmatter.title: JS Array Cardio - part 2
frontmatter.desc: This is the seventh project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We will be creating a bunch of small examples to play with various array methods such as `some()`, `every()`, `find()`, `findIndex()`, `splice()`

frontmatter.title: Drum kit
frontmatter.desc: This is the first project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We will be building a "drumkit" as shown in the first two minutes of the video below. The page plays certain sound effects on pressing keys from A to L on the qwerty keyboard.
